traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Tabaxi have lifespans equivalent to humans.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Tabaxi tend toward chaotic alignments, as they let impulse and fancy guide their decisions. They are rarely evil, with most of them driven by curiosity rather than greed or other dark impulses.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Tabaxi are taller on average than humans and relatively slender. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Feline Agility
traits.description: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move O feet on one of your turns.

traits.name: Cat's Claws
traits.description: Because of your claws, you have a climbing speed of 20 feet. In addition, your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to ld4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

traits.name: Cat's Talent
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception and Stealth skills.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.
